name: Hopping Out
description:
Player 1: Keyboard

A-D Horizontal move

Space - Jump

Player 2: Controller

Joystick - Horizontal move

X (Ps4) or A (xbox) - Jump

Fullscreen recommended.

Feel free to add me on discord Jenspt#2693 or send me a mail to Grujkee@gmail.com for Unity, Construct or Html projects

Comments are welcome

DISCLAIMER:

I made this game for study purposes, I have no intention of earning money nor getting donations for this game. The assets were not made by me. This game was created using free assets found on the itch.io store and OpenGameArt. I do not own the rights to the art, sounds or fonts used in this game, credits to the authors.
